title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, January 4, 2020
description: It’s the birthday of Pulitzer-Prize winning historian and biographer Doris Kearns Goodwin (1943), whose most recent book is "Leadership in Turbulent Times."
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the birthday of Pulitzer-Prize winning historian and biographer Doris Kearns Goodwin (1943), whose most recent book is "Leadership in Turbulent Times."
